dc:title: Day After Day - With Those Who Labor In South's Vineyards
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Chatty account of a trip with her daughter to Alabama where she visits St. Peter Claver, union halls, and the local bishop who is involved with work on behalf of seamen. Misses being home in New York and is grateful for the news of a good Christmas there.
